title: 1 Thing
lyrics:
[Intro:]
na na, na, na, oh
na na, na, na, oh
na na, na, na, oh
na na, na, na oh

[Verse One:]

Oh, trying to let it go

Trying to keep my eyes closed

Trying to keep it just like before

The times we never even thought to speak

Don't wanna tell you what it is

Or the way i felt so serious

Got me thinking just too much

I wanna set it off, but...



[Chorus:]

It's this 1 thing that got me trippin

It's this 1 thing that got me trippin (you did)

This 1 thing my soul made me feel it

It's this 1 thing you did oh oh oh

It's this 1 thing that caught me slippin

It's this 1 thing I want to admit it (you did)

This 1 thing and I was so wit it

It's this 1 thing you did oh oh



[Verse Two:]

Hey, we don't know each other well

So what? I keep thinking to myself

Memories just keep ringing bells

Ding dong, ding dong, ding

Hear voices I don't want to understand (stand)

My car keys are jingling in my hand

My high heels are clicking towards your door

Ding dong, ding dong, ding



[Chorus:]

It's this 1 thing that got me trippin

It's this 1 thing that got me trippin (you did)

This 1 thing my soul made me feel it

It's this 1 thing you did (oh oh oh)

It's this 1 thing that's caught me slippin

It's this 1 thing I want to admit it (you did)

This 1 thing and I was so with it

It's this 1 thing you did oh oh oh



[Bridge:]

And maybe I just can't believe it

It's this one thing you did (oh oh oh)

I can't deny, tired of trying

Open up the door, but just keep on seeing you

I'm hoping you can keep a secret (a secret)

For me, for me, for me

think what you did, yeah



[Chorus:]

It's this 1 thing that got me trippin

It's this 1 thing that got me trippin (you did)

This 1 thing my soul made me feel it

It's this 1 thing you did oh oh oh

It's this 1 thing that's caught me slippin (caught me slippin')

It's this 1 thing I want to admit it (you did)

This 1 thing and I was so with it

It's this 1 thing you did oh oh



Oh oh oh [4 times]

na na, na, na, oh

na na, na, na, oh

na na, na, na, oh

na na, na, na oh



(don't know what it is)

[Chorus:][2x]

It's this 1 thing that got me trippin

It's this 1 thing that got me trippin (you did)

This 1 thing my soul made me feeling

It's this 1 thing you did oh oh

It's this 1 thing that's caught me slippin

It's this 1 thing I want to admit it

This 1 thing and I was so with it

It's this 1 thing you did oh oh oh



Oh oh, Oh oh [until fade out]
